parameters.name: PartThreshold
parameters.description: 1.0 >= Double value for part or body selection threshold >= 0.0; 1.0 selects nothing, and 0.0 selects all (see Remarks )

title: IConfigurationManager.AddSpeedPak2
description: Creates a SpeedPak configuration that includes all faces and the specified threshold of parts or bodies for the active assembly configuration.
signature:
System.Object AddSpeedPak2( 
   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Double
PartThreshold
)

parameters.name: PartThreshold
parameters.description: 1.0 >= Double value for part or body selection threshold >= 0.0; 1.0 selects nothing, and 0.0 selects all (see Remarks )

remarks:
PartThreshold corresponds to the value of the
Bodies to Include
slider on the SpeedPak PropertyManager page.
This method includes all faces in the SpeedPak configuration.
